resources.string: Select a taxonomic thesaurus to manage. You can see the thesaurus\' properties and delete it. You can also look for taxa.

string.name: tvSynonymous
string.b: It is a synonym, the accepted name is:

string.name: thChooseIntro
string.b: Choose taxonomic thesaurus of the system

resources.string: There are no taxonomic thesauri in the system. Import one with the Import taxonomic thesaurus option
Do you want to delete this taxonomic thesaurus?
Taxonomic thesaurus in use. It can not be deleted.
Please do not close this window. The import process may take a few minutes, depending on the size of the taxonomic thesaurus.
There already is an existing thesaurus in the system, called
No selected thesaurus. Choose one or select not using taxonomic thesaurus
